Class Player

java.lang.Object
Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
This is the Player class. All user interaction takes place in this class. This player object is stored and instantiated in the ThatsLife class. References to this may also be found in some of the deck classes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Player​(java.lang.String name)
    This constructor initializes default values for the player attributes as described in the Machine Project specifications.

      Returns:
      isActive : boolean

    • credit

      public void credit​(double amount, java.lang.String desc)
      This operational method adds a double amount to the player's current balance. It also display's the purpose of that credit.
      Parameters:
      amount - - the double value to be added to the player's current balance.
      desc - - the description to be dispalyed when crediting the amount.

    • debit

      public void debit​(double amount, java.lang.String desc)
      This operational method subtracts a given double amount from the player's current balance. It also display's the purpose of the debit. If the given amount is greater than the player's balance, then it calls the loan() method until the player has the right balance then subtracts.
      Parameters:
      amount - - the double value to be added to the player's current balance
      desc - - the description to be displayed when debiting the amount.

    • rawDebit

      public void rawDebit​(double amount, java.lang.String desc)
      This operational method subtracts a given double amount from the player's current balance. It also display's the purpose of that debit. Unlike the debit() method, this does not call the loan() method when the player has insufficient balance. It subtracts it either way.
      Parameters:
      amount - - the double value to be added to the player's current balance
      desc - - the description to be displayed when debiting the amount.

    • setSalary

    • setSpace

      public void setSpace​(Space space)
      This setter method sets the player's current space. This method should only be called when manually overriding. This method does not call the space's event.
      Parameters:
      space - : Space

    • move

      public int move​(int steps)
      This operational method moves the player by the number of steps as parameter. This method automatically calls the space's event on the space that it lands on. This method also stops moving the player when it comes across a MagentaSpace.
      Parameters:
      steps - : int - number of steps to move
      Returns:
      moved : int - number of steps actually moved

    • decision

      public int decision​(java.lang.String options)
      This method prompts the user to make a decision, based on a string as parameter.
      Parameters:
      options - : String - a String that holds the options to be prompted to the player
      Returns:
      choice : int - a numerical value that the player enters

    • spin

      public int spin()
      This method prompts the user that it will generate a random number using the randomizer method in ThatsLife. It then rolls a random number and returns it.
      Returns:
      n : int

    • doLoan

      public void doLoan​(int n)
      This method executes the loan() function n times.
      Parameters:
      n - - number of times to loan

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      Converts the player data and consolidates them into a singe usable string.

      Returns:
